channel.title: pin on Julio Merino (jmmv.dev)
channel.description: Recent content in pin on Julio Merino (jmmv.dev)

item.title: Using C++ templates to optimize code
item.description: As part of the project I'm currently involved in at university, I started (re)writing a Pin tool to gather run-time traces of applications parallelized with OpenMP. This tool has to support two modes: one to generate a single trace for the whole application and one to generate one trace per parallel region of the application. In the initial versions of my rewrite, I followed the idea of the previous version of the tool: have a -split flag in the frontend that enables or disables the behavior described above.
